2025-05-13PMOMinistries and Ministers of State ActOrder Assigning the Minister of State (Sport) to Assist the Minister of Canadian HeritageOrder assigning the Honourable ADAM VAN KOEVERDEN, Minister of State (Sport), to assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage in the carrying out of that Minister's responsibilities.N/A
act: Ministries and Ministers of State Act
subject: Order Assigning the Minister of State (Sport) to Assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage
precis: Order assigning the Honourable ADAM VAN KOEVERDEN, Minister of State (Sport), to assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage in the carrying out of that Minister's responsibilities.
